SELECT b.mabn,to_char(a.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngaycd,to_char(b.ngayvao,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngaykham,to_char(c.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngaytd FROM hsoftdkbd0320.v_m38ct a inner join hsoftdkbd0320.v_m38ll  b on a.id=b.id  inner join hsoftdkbd0320.tiepdon c on b.maql=c.maql where a.dongia=38700 and a.mavp in (SELECT id FROM hsoftdkbd.v_giavp where id_loai=148) and a.ngay<>c.ngay and b.mabn in (

CONCATENATE("update hsoftdkbd0220.v_m38ct set ngay=to_date('";D2;"','dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') where id in (select id from hsoftdkbd0220.v_m38ll where mabn='";A2;"') and to_char(ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi')='";B2;"' and dongia=38700;")
